scripts.start:all: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & del /f /q package-lock.json pnpm-lock.yaml 2>nul & npm cache clean --force
scripts.build:android: npm run clean && npm run install:all && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && cd .. && npx react-native start --reset-cache
